dataset.name: All movements
dataset.query: SELECT 'A0059EA' AS prisonNumber,'SOPRANO, K' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-01 15:34:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'KIRKHAM (HMP)' AS origin,'OUT' AS direction, 'REL' AS type,'Administrative Release due to Merge' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G3568GQ' AS prisonNumber,'CALANDER, E' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-02 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'OUTSIDE' AS origin,'OUT' AS direction, 'REL' AS type,'Abscond' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G3019GQ' AS prisonNumber,'MISTICK, D' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-03 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'KIRKHAM (HMP)' AS origin,'IN' AS direction, 'ADM' AS type,'Transfer In from Other Establishment' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G3020GQ' AS prisonNumber,'SOPRANO, A' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-04 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'KIRKHAM (HMP)' AS origin,'IN' AS direction, 'ADM' AS type,'Transfer In from Other Establishment' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G3020GQ' AS prisonNumber,'SOPRANO, D' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-05 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'KIRKHAM (HMP)' AS origin,'IN' AS direction, 'ADM' AS type,'Transfer In from Other Establishment' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G3020GQ' AS prisonNumber,'SOPRANO, C' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-06-03 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'KIRKHAM (HMP)' AS origin,'IN' AS direction, 'ADM' AS type,'Transfer In from Other Establishment' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G4020GQ' AS prisonNumber,'SOPRANO, T' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-07 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'KIRKHAM (HMP)' AS origin,'OUT' AS direction, 'TAP' AS type,'Short Home Leave' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G4055GQ' AS prisonNumber,'SOPRANO, D' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-08 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'KIRKHAM (HMP)' AS origin,'OUT' AS direction, 'TAP' AS type,'Short Home Leave' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G4055GQ' AS prisonNumber,'CASEDY, E' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-09 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'UNKNOWN LOCATION' AS origin,'IN' AS direction, 'ADM' AS type,'Returns' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G4055GQ' AS prisonNumber,'THERIS, E' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-10 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'UNKNOWN LOCATION' AS origin,'IN' AS direction, 'ADM' AS type,'Returns' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G4055GQ' AS prisonNumber,'NADAND, I' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-11 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'UNKNOWN LOCATION' AS origin,'IN' AS direction, 'ADM' AS type,'Returns' AS reason UNION SELECT 'G4055GQ' AS prisonNumber,'TOMAS, I' AS name,TO_TIMESTAMP('2024-03-12 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:ss') AS date,'UNKNOWN LOCATION' AS origin,'IN' AS direction, 'ADM' AS type,'Returns' AS reason

report.name: Last month
report.description: All movements in the past month
